# adblockerGPT

> Free, lightweight browser extension that blocks ads on ChatGPT and all websites. Privacy-focused, no data collection, works on Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Brave.

adblockerGPT removes sponsored content, banners, pop-ups, and trackers from ChatGPT and other websites. It's specifically optimized for ChatGPT's interface while also working as a general ad blocker for Google Ads, Taboola, Outbrain, and other ad networks.

Key features: real-time ad blocking, per-page blocked counter, one-click toggle, ~35KB size, Manifest V3 compliant, 100% free with no premium tier.

## Documentation

- [Homepage](https://www.adblockergpt.com): Download links and feature overview
- [Privacy Policy](https://www.adblockergpt.com/privacy): Data collection practices
- [About](https://www.adblockergpt.com/about): Project background and team
- [Contact](https://www.adblockergpt.com/contact): Support and feedback
